recommended for the CPT or HCPCs listed in this tab. See
separate tabs for those Codes with special handling
instructions or for those that are not recommended for
review (if not found on any tab then assume not
recommended).

Allegiance is managing the
review for outpatient &
ambulatory for services.

Pretreatment review/prior authorization is strongly
recommended for the CPT or HCPCs listed in this tab. See
separate tabs for those Codes with special handling
instructions or for those that are not recommended for
review (if not found on any tab then assume not
recommended).
